name: CreateCustomerReturn
description:
Create a return order from an existing sales order (`OrderID`).

When a `TargetOrderID` has been specified, newly created lines are added to that specific order. When omitted, the lines are either added to the
existing, original order (in case that is still permitted) or a new order is created automatically.

Returns information on the (newly created?) return order.

properties.name: AmountToRefund
properties.description: When a ReturnWithoutProducts is done, but not the full amount should be refunded, a different amount can be provided - cannot exceed the worth of the returned products

properties.name: BackendID
properties.description: Optional, attached to a possible newly created (return) order - requires `BackendSystemID`

properties.name: BackendSystemID
properties.description: Optional, attached to a possible newly created (return) order - requires `BackendID`

properties.name: CreateInOriginalOrganizationUnit
properties.description: Attach the order to the same OrganizationUnit as the returned order

properties.name: CustomFields
properties.description: The custom fields to store on the orderline. The key of the dictionary should be the name of the custom field.

properties.name: RefundCorrectionReasonID
properties.description: When not the whole amount is refunded, a reason for this correction can be set. This will only have an affect if `UnitAmountToRefund` is lower than the total amount of this return line.

properties.name: UnitAmountToRefund
properties.description: When a ReturnWithoutProducts is done, but not the full amount should be refunded, a different amount can be provided - cannot exceed the worth of the returned products

properties.name: RefundCorrectionReasonID
properties.description: When not the whole amount is refunded, a reason for this correction can be set. This will only have an affect if `AmountToRefund` is lower than the total amount of this return.

properties.name: ReturnWithoutProducts
properties.description: The products will not be returned, so the return order will be shipped immediately and the stock will be corrected

properties.name: SecurityCode
properties.description: User is allowed to create return order when a valid security code is provided. The user has to have the ReturnWithoutSecurityCode role when omitted. `CRM:Return:RequiresOrderSecurityCode` needs to be enabled.

properties.name: StockOrganizationUnitID
properties.description: When the stock should be returned to a specific OrganizationUnit (see `GetReturnableStatusForOrder.StockOrganizationUnits`)

properties.name: Code
properties.description: A unique ID identifying this error.

properties.name: Message
properties.description: A human-readable message describing the error.

properties.name: RequestID
properties.description: A unique ID identifying the request. Please provide this ID when contacting support.

properties.name: Type
properties.description: A short description of the error type.

properties.name: ExternalIDs
properties.description: When using the `ExternalIDs` mode, this will hold the resolved external IDs.

properties.name: IsAsyncResultAvailable
properties.description: This is a flag indicating whether the async request is done. If it is `null`, it is not an async service. If it is `false`, the response is not yet available. Do not process the properties in that case. It is is `true` the properties are filled with the result of the call.

properties.name: UnresolvedExternalIDs
properties.description: When using the `ExternalIDs` mode, this will hold the external IDs we couldn't resolve.
